info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io

Class NetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.NetHelper

  • public final class NetHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    |NetHelper| is a helper class for various internet- related actions, such as downloading files and sending e-mails.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Lukas Diener
